name: Curvatron
description: Curvatron is a minimalist twist on the classic snake games you played on your Nokia 3310 when you didn’t have your Gameboy around. Bring back the memories of the mindless addiction with this new way to play!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, probably even 9 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Requires a screen Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: You'll be missing some cool tunes if you don't have one

reviews.review_text: This game is marketed as 'Snake with a twist' - which is the most correct definition possibkle. Instead of moving vertically and horizontally, you are moving circular. This makes for an interesting game experience.   Also, the dev is a cool guy who listens to feedback and solves your issues, so that's a big plus. :)
Curvatron is the most delightfully simple, elagant and infuriatingly ♥♥♥♥ing difficult piece of ♥♥♥♥ I have ever played.
real cool. easy to grasp but very hard. graphics are elegant yet very simple, calming soundtrack too. this is the type of game that youll be playing for hours before you even realize it.
Hard as balls but great music!  8/10

It's a very simple but challenging, harded than it looks snake. It has very nice, clean graphics and a fantastic soundtrack that will calm you down while you keep hitting walls or eating your own tail.   If you enjoy difficult but fair, skill based games, this one is for you.
The only word i can say about this game:        CURWA
Simple enough, well made.  + Great, varying music + Simple controls + Good difficulty progression/introduction to the game * Minimalist, clear visuals
Very fun game, good price. I like the character and stages. Good for boredom!  I recommend this game to all people. Hehehe.
